description: German inflation dipped against expectations in June, data showed on Wednesday, but economists said one-off effects were largely behind the fall and warned against seeing it as an early end to price pressures.
title: German inflation eases on one-offs, eurozone morale mixed - Reuters.com

description: U.S. consumer spending rose less than expected in May as motor vehicles remained scarce while higher prices forced cutbacks on purchases of other goods, another sign that the rebound in economic growth early in the second quarter was losing steam.
title: U.S. consumer spending rises moderately; inflation pushes higher - Reuters.com

title: Russian state companies hike salaries amid double-digit inflation - Reuters

description: Indonesia's consumer prices rose at the fastest pace in five years in June, topping forecasts and breaching the central bank's target range amid a surge in food prices, official data showed on Friday.
title: Indonesia's inflation hits 5-year high, above c.bank target - Reuters

description: It may just boil down to semantics, and in good times when inflation is low it's not an issue at all. But the Fed has a communication problem.
title: Column: Fed's inflation target ambiguity risks market misstep - Reuters.com
content:
ORLANDO, Fla., June 30 (Reuters) - It may just boil down to semantics, and in good times when inflation is low it's not an issue at all. But the Fed has a communication problem.
